title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10ยง 1.21 - Noncompliance or nonconformance; penalties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10ยง 1.21 - Noncompliance or nonconformance; penalties

State Regulations

Noncompliance or nonconformance with any provision of this Chapter constitutes a violation punishable on conviction for a first offense by a fine not exceeding $250 or by imprisonment for not exceeding 15 days, or both; and for a second or subsequent offense by a fine not exceeding $500 or by imprisonment for not exceeding 15 days, or both. [FN**] See Public Health Law, ยง229. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10ยง
1.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
